amendment.description: Amendment provides $1 milllion to the U.S. Institute of Peace for the purpose of reestablishing the Iraq Study Group.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide additional funding (by transfer) for the Iraq Study Group in the amount of $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shays amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 355 - 69 (Roll no. 529).
